data.message: We don't like it actually. When you go and change things, without notice....we do not like that.

replies.message: nicely said Laurel McComesky, especially done without choice

actually it hit google news a couple weeks ago that they were going to do this. Or maybe they sent out an email. Either way, there was a warning that this was coming this time. I personally don't notice a difference, but then I barely ever log into fb, now.
Give us a choice! I promise that we can think on our own!

When you play a game, on the News Feed the pictures are so huge it is totally ridiculous. Do you think when people play games, they are visually impaired...badly???? I have no problem with change, but find this is a change that goes in the "much worse" direction than it was.....yuk!!

I don't have it yet but I saw it on a friends pc. You can keep it, I don't want it. Facebook is yours Mr Zuckerberg, but where would you be without us.?Listen to the people or at least give them a choice to have or have not.
